title: julerz12
author: julerz12
created_time: February 27, 2023, 01:13:39 AMLast edit: May 30, 2023, 03:01:28 PM by julerz12
content: Evolia Protocol's bounty campaign has officially ended.The spreadsheet will be finalized and sent to the Evolia Protocol team. The team will facilitate the rewards distribution within 1 to 2 weeks after this campaign has ended.[EDIT]4/13/23The Final List of participants eligible for the $EVO token rewards has been forwarded to the Evolia Protocol Team.[EDIT]4/24/23Update from the Evolia Protocol Team:QuoteAll our rewards (from bitcointalk, zealy, gleam etc) will be distributed on Launch day, which is May 26th.[EDIT]5/29/23The Evolia Protocol Team previously planned to distribute the rewards on 5/26. I've reached out to the team again for an update. Stay tuned.[EDIT]5/30/23The Evolia Protocol team has started the first few batches of the bounty rewards distribution.https://arbiscan.io/tx/0xbcb860b52c6c5e03c1f32c879129ad87a9aaaba9d5b0f8eadd56d9beb270dabbhttps://arbiscan.io/tx/0x30f015db38d2a70c5205affba988eda5561e0a83ff2508f0ee1176044970a428https://arbiscan.io/tx/0x874ea579e243a2046fb5250d0b978ae2240c55737ea5e2ed219c1963eb4952adNOTE:  4% of your total rewards are sent on TGE then the rest are sent again 4% per month for 24 months. See announcement here: https://t.me/Evolia_Protocol/105See their tokenomics here: https://www.evoliaprotocol.net/tokenomics/Disclaimer: I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I am paid only to manage this bounty campaign. I will not be held responsible should the developers/project team fail to reach their stated goals/obligations to the bounty participants, investors, and everyone else. THIS BOUNTY CAMPAIGN DO NOT HAVE AN OFFICIAL ESCROW TO ITS BOUNTY POOL. THE BOUNTY CAMPAIGN MANAGER CANNOT GUARANTEE THE REWARDS AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN. Join (on this bounty campaign), invest (on their ICO/IDO/IEO), or use their platform at your own risk.
